title: Casual Game Music Pack
description: A total of 17 top-notch tracks, great for casual games.
longDescription:
Kanjian offers you the ultimate one-stop-shop audio experience. We recognize the significance of high-quality audio in creating a captivating game, and that's precisely what we provide. Our collection features top-notch music across all genres, sound FX customized to fit any game category, and any audio content that comes to mind.


Included in our pack are 17 meticulously chosen royalty-free tracks, ideal for the casual game you're developing!
